com.google.common.collect

接口 Streams.IntFunctionWithIndex<R>

  • 封闭类:
    Streams

    @Beta
public static interface Streams.IntFunctionWithIndex<R>
    An analogue of IntFunction also accepting an index.

    This interface is only intended for use by callers of Streams.mapWithIndex(IntStream, IntFunctionWithIndex).

    从以下版本开始:
    21.0

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      R apply(int from, long index)
      Applies this function to the given argument and its index within a stream.

    • 方法详细资料

      • apply

        R apply(int from,
        long index)
        Applies this function to the given argument and its index within a stream.
